value.title: AI Hype Or AI Hope: When Will AI Disrupt The Pharmaceutical Industry?
value.excerpt: Since 2014 deep learning systems started outperforming humans in many tasks such as image, text, and voice recognition. But when it comes to drug discovery the rate of progress is seemingly slow. When are we going to see the fruits of the research in AI translating into real drugs?

value.title: OpenAI introduces Jukebox, a new AI model that generates genre-specific music with lyrics
value.excerpt: The way OpenAI did it was also fascinating. They used raw audio to train the model — which spits out raw audio in return — instead of using “symbolic music,” like player pianos use, because symbolic music doesn’t include voices.

value.title: Google’s AI can adjust voice emotion, pitch, and speed with 30 minutes of data
